snippet: Former Gov. Martin O’Malley has focused his campaign message on the anti-Wall Street sentiment popular among the Democratic left. An ad supporting him frames the critique around political dynasties as well.
abstract: Former Gov. Martin O’Malley has focused his campaign message on the anti-Wall Street sentiment popular among the Democratic left. An ad supporting him frames the critique around political dynasties as well.

headline.main: Ad Backing Martin O’Malley Jabs at Hillary Clinton and Jeb Bush
